special_abilities.name: Keen Sight and Smell.
descriptions: The vulture has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics.
descriptions: The vulture has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The vulture makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Beak.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.
